00041 #define MIN_GAMMA 0.01
00042 #define MAX_GAMMA 99.9
00043 #define DEFAULT_GAMMA 1.0
00044 #define DEFAULT_BLACK_POINT 95
00045 #define DEFAULT_WHITE_POINT 685
00046 
00047 void
00048 logImageSetVerbose(int verbosity)
00049 {
00050     cineonSetVerbose(verbosity);
00051     dpxSetVerbose(verbosity);
00052 }
00053 
00054 LogImageFile*
00055 logImageOpen(const char* filename, int cineon)
00056 {
00057     if (cineon) {
00058         return cineonOpen(filename);
00059     }
00060     else {
00061         return dpxOpen(filename);
00062     }
00063     return 0;
00064 }
00065 
00066 LogImageFile*
00067 logImageOpenFromMem(unsigned char *buffer, unsigned int size, int cineon)
00068 {
00069     if (cineon) {
00070         return cineonOpenFromMem(buffer, size);
00071     }
00072     else {
00073         return dpxOpenFromMem(buffer, size);
00074     }
00075     return 0;
00076 }

00078 LogImageFile*
00079 logImageCreate(const char* filename, int cineon, int width, int height, int depth)
00080 {
00081     if (cineon) {
00082         return cineonCreate(filename, width, height, depth);
00083     }
00084     else {
00085         return dpxCreate(filename, width, height, depth);
00086     }
00087     return 0;

00090 int
00091 logImageGetSize(const LogImageFile* logImage, int* width, int* height, int* depth)
00092 {
00093     *width = logImage->width;
00094     *height = logImage->height;
00095     *depth = logImage->depth;

00099 int
00100 logImageGetByteConversionDefaults(LogImageByteConversionParameters* params)
00101 {
00102     params->gamma = DEFAULT_GAMMA;
00103     params->blackPoint = DEFAULT_BLACK_POINT;
00104     params->whitePoint = DEFAULT_WHITE_POINT;
00105     params->doLogarithm = 0;
00106     return 0;
00107 }
00108 
00109 int
00110 logImageGetByteConversion(const LogImageFile* logImage, LogImageByteConversionParameters* params)
00111 {
00112     params->gamma = logImage->params.gamma;
00113     params->blackPoint = logImage->params.blackPoint;
00114     params->whitePoint = logImage->params.whitePoint;
00115     params->doLogarithm = 0;
00116     return 0;
00117 }
00118 
00119 int
00120 logImageSetByteConversion(LogImageFile* logImage, const LogImageByteConversionParameters* params)
00121 {
00122     if ((params->gamma >= MIN_GAMMA) &&
00123             (params->gamma <= MAX_GAMMA) &&
00124             (params->blackPoint >= 0) &&
00125             (params->blackPoint < params->whitePoint) &&
00126             (params->whitePoint <= 1023)) {
00127         logImage->params.gamma = params->gamma;
00128         logImage->params.blackPoint = params->blackPoint;
00129         logImage->params.whitePoint = params->whitePoint;
00130         logImage->params.doLogarithm = params->doLogarithm;
00131         setupLut16(logImage);
00132         return 0;
00133     }
00134     return 1;
00135 }

00155 void
00156 logImageDump(const char* filename)
00157 {
00158 
00159     U32 magic;
00160 
00161     FILE* foo = BLI_fopen(filename, "rb");
00162     if (foo == 0) {
00163         return;
00164     }
00165 
00166     if (fread(&magic, sizeof(magic), 1, foo) == 0) {
00167         fclose(foo);
00168         return;
00169     }
00170 
00171     fclose(foo);
00172 
00173     if (magic == ntohl(CINEON_FILE_MAGIC)) {
00174 #if 0
00175         cineonDump(filename);
00176 #endif
00177     }
00178     else if (magic == ntohl(DPX_FILE_MAGIC)) {
00179         dpxDump(filename);
00180     }
00181 }
